      • determineRenderSize

        private static float determineRenderSize(ObjectInSpace object)
        Parameters:
        object - Object that has an unknown render size. Currently only Sun and Planet are recognized.
        Returns:
        The render size of the object. Non-Sun and Planets are of size 1.

      • renderSphere

        private static void renderSphere(float x,
                float y,
                float z,
                float radius)
        Draws a sphere of the given size.
        Parameters:
        x - x sphere location.
        y - y sphere location.
        z - z sphere location.
        radius - Radius of the sphere.

      • renderSphere

        private static void renderSphere(Point3D position,
                float radius,
                float scalar)
        Scales the location and then uses the other renderSphere method.
        Parameters:
        position - Position of the sphere.
        radius - Radius of the sphere.
        scalar - Scales the position so that things aren't ridiculously spread out.

      • setColor

        private static void setColor(java.awt.Color color)
        Parameters:
